sentence: NC-Sen: Snowflake Bathroom Bill Gov Compares Himself Not Getting A Job At Duke To 1960s Segregation Daily Kos, poopdogcomedy, 1/27/2022 Madison Cawthorn case could spell trouble for other insurrectionists' including Trump Madison Cawthorn, NC-11 If an effort to disqualify Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-NC) from the ballot is successful, it could lead to similar challenges against other lawmakers accused of fueling the Capitol insurrection including former president Donald Trump.The case against Cawthorn who cheered on the Jan. 6 rioters seeks to force him to prove that he's not an insurrectionist based on a little-known section of the 14th Amendment that was adopted to punish members of the Confederacy after they reclaimed their elected offices in Washington.
title: North Carolina Open Thread: Fentanyl test strips, Whining McCrory and Cawthorn's Corner
